subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Golden State is off to a 37-4 start, going 19-0 at Oracle Arena, but it is not guaranteed of getting home-court advantage for the postseason: The Spurs are just two games back.
snippet: Golden State is off to a 37-4 start, going 19-0 at Oracle Arena, but it is not guaranteed of getting home-court advantage for the postseason: The Spurs are just two games back.
